articles.author: Katherine Doherty
articles.title: NYSE Builds Venue for 24/7 Trading of Tokenized Stocks, ETFs - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The New York Stock Exchange is building a venue using blockchain technology to allow for trading tokenized stocks and exchange-traded funds around the clock.
articles.content:
The New York Stock Exchange is building a venue using blockchain technology to allow for trading tokenized stocks and exchange-traded funds around the clock.
